name: Last Light (Artists Attempt Coding)
description:
'Artists Attempt Coding' is made up of three Australian based students studying game design & art at Torrens University. We created our game project 'Last Light' for our task. We had so much fun creating this game that we decided to share it with you all! Check it out & let us know what you think!
